name: Lost Light Alpha 0.1
description:
This is a 0.1 Alpha for Lost Soul.

[Note: This is a small project that I plain to work on till I feel it to be finished]

[20 Free Keys After Hour Studio (socialcreator.com))]

Controls 

  • Arrow Key = Move
  • Z, Space and Enter = Enter
  • X = Bag

A kid's head starts to fill light so he wants to get food, but finds his room's door is linked to a room with some doors.

Can you find the truth ?
